title: Views from the Next Generation
content:
Views from the Next Generation is a series of policy briefs that offer recommendations for the most significant challenges facing Japan and its international partners today. Annually since 2014, leading and emerging scholars have brought their expertise to bear on issues from peacekeeping to nuclear deterrence to disaster management. Stimson's Japan Program, led by Director Yuki Tatsumi, has compiled these short policy essays into volumes that provide insight into the views of younger scholars and experts on critical issues.
2019 Volume
The 6th volume of Views from the Next Generation will be released online on March 11, 2019.
Past Volumes

Balancing Between Nuclear Deterrence and Disarmament (2018)
Launch Event
 
 

Peacebuilding and Japan (2017)
Launch Event
 
 

Japan as a Peace Enabler (2016)
Launch Event
 
 

Japan's Global Diplomacy (2015)
Launch Event
 
 

Japan's Foreign Policy Challenges in East Asia (2014)
 
 
 
 
This series is possible with the support of the Embassy of Japan in Washington, D.C.
author: Yuki Tatsumi
